Action.body: You need to make sure that you have the right setting for `CORE_VM_ENDPOINT`. Typically this ends up being the remote port for the Docker daemon which is not running by default. You'll need to start the Docker daemon with the `-H` option to and specify the remote IP:Port you want it to listen on (e.g. `-H tcp://0.0.0.0:2375` ) and then specify that as the value for `CORE_VM_ENDPOINT` . If you use `-H tcp://0.0.0.0:2375` , then the default value in the docs should work
